/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their red brick facades adding a touch of color to the urban landscape. Cars and motorcycles are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the red brick buildings. In the distance, trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting.
